remarks: Since by ~ pserulm the series converges uniformly, it is also continuous by ~ ulmcn .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Mar-2015.)
statement:
pserf.g $e |- G = ( x e. CC |-> ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( A ` n ) x. ( x ^ n ) ) ) ) $.
pserf.f $e |- F = ( y e. S |-> sum_ j e. NN0 ( ( G ` y ) ` j ) ) $.
pserf.a $e |- ( ph -> A : NN0 --> CC ) $.
pserf.r $e |- R = sup ( { r e. RR | seq 0 ( + , ( G ` r ) ) e. dom ~~> } , RR* , < ) $.
pserulm.h $e |- H = ( i e. NN0 |-> ( y e. S |-> ( seq 0 ( + , ( G ` y ) ) ` i ) ) ) $.
pserulm.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. RR ) $.
pserulm.l $e |- ( ph -> M < R ) $.
pserulm.y $e |- ( ph -> S C_ ( `' abs " ( 0 [,] M ) ) ) $.
psercn2 $p |- ( ph -> F e. ( S -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d A j n r x y $.
$d G i j r y $.
$d H i j y $.
$d M i j y $.
$d S i j y $.
$d i j ph y $.
$d i j r x y $.
